page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT IN KINNEFF AREA
page.content: There are approximately 140 adults in our area. Roughly 24 of these adults are retired, although 1 or 2 do have some part_time work. There are 6 {unemployed,}mostly teenagers. Only one adult is involved in{further {education.}Out of the remaining adults approximately 1/3 work in the area. They have jobs such as farmworker, garage proprietor, minister, shop owner, lighthouse keeper or headmaster. Approximately 1/3 work outside the area in places such as Aberdeen, Montrose, Inverbervie or Stonehaven. They work in a variety of different jobs such as a labourer, technical author, factory worker or a surveyor. The remaining adults are housewives who do not go out to work, but are sometimes involved in casual farmwork, along with children over 13, at the{potato and strawberry harvest.
